data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_0_0
data.value: [NEW] The generated thumbnail has been redesigned to be more realistic and visually accurate. [NEW] The road width now includes the space for both sidewalks and asphalt. [NEW] You can now choose the texture for the sides of the road at both ground and bridge elevation, as well as removing the asphalt texture from the road. [NEW] Curb delimiters have been added, allowing for customizable sidewalks by adding or removing lanes before/after them. [NEW] Lines now represent individual lanes (previous options such as 1L, 2L, 3L have been removed). [NEW] The default lane direction is now two-way, and the "None" option has been removed. [NEW] Grass, gravel, pavement, and tree lane types have been combined into a single "Filler" type. [NEW] A new add-on feature allows you to choose the surface of any lane and add decorations to Filler and Curb lanes. These add-ons include: Filler, Grass, Gravel, Pavement, Tree, Benches, Flower Pots, Street Light, Double Street Light, Bollard, Hedge, Transit Stop, Trash Bin, Bike Parking, Street Ads, and Barrier. [NEW] The "Add stop to filler" option has been moved to the add-ons feature as "Transit Stop.". [NEW] The user interface for customizing lane width, elevation, and speed was moved directly into the lane settings. [NEW] You can now remove the padding of fillers on the left, right, or both sides. [NEW] A duplicate button has been added for lanes. [NEW] A LHT (left-hand traffic) indicator has been added to thumbnails. [NEW] A built-in font is now used for speed signs and road widths, you can still choose a custom font. [NEW] You can now snap road widths to vanilla-compatible values. [NEW] Empty lanes are now just empty space and cannot have any add-ons. [NEW] Clearing lanes will now also clear the road width, speed limit, and custom name. [NEW] Duplicate Flip no longer duplicates the filler in the middle of the road. [NEW] A button has been added to the options panel which allows you to re-generate all previously exported roads in case you change your default settings or colors and want to apply the changes automatically. [NEW] Added Highways and Flat Roads road-type options. [NEW] Added Intersection Marking Tool auto-generated markings. [NEW] You can choose between IMT & AN markings in the settings. [NEW] IMT is now required to use this mod. [NEW] Setting the Buffer Width to 0 will now hide line markings at the curb. [NEW] Grass lanes will now change to pavement when a bus stop is present. [NEW] Lane surfaces that are next to each other will now be merged into one. [NEW] Added an indicator that a road was saved in the road list & a checkbox to hide roads you’ve already saved from the list. [NEW] The following options have been added to the mod's settings:. [NEW] Place traffic lights on the opposite side of the junction. [NEW] Add lane arrows (enabled by default). [NEW] Add lane decals (enabled by default). [NEW] Add grass props to grass lanes (enabled by default). [NEW] Use vanilla tree placement. [NEW] Use vanilla streetlight placement. [UPDATED] The default width of bus lanes has been changed to 3 meters. [UPDATED] The angle of diagonal parking has been increased from 45 to 60 degrees. [UPDATED] The extra road width will now be used to expand sidewalks rather than fillers. [UPDATED] Pedestrian Traffic lights no longer get generated if the walking distance is less or equal to 3m and fixed them sometimes not showing when they should. [UPDATED] Removed ghost lanes, IMT points are now generated for all lanes. [UPDATED] Trees will now always be visible, and you can use an AN toggle to hide those close to the intersection. [UPDATED] The curb on crosswalks has been lowered and is now almost flush with the asphalt. [UPDATED] The filler settings have been simplified to only include "filled" and "dashed". The previous options can now be selected within the Thumbnail Maker. [UPDATED] The generation options panel will no longer appear after selecting a road to build. Instead, the generation process will start immediately. [UPDATED] The elevation of props and lanes on grass, pavement, and gravel will default to a higher elevation, and props will no longer change elevation when hiding markings;. [UPDATED] AN Fillers can no longer be individually hidden. [UPDATED] The buffer width can no longer be set to a value below 0. [UPDATED] Removed the minimum width limit for tram side poles. [UPDATED] The mod folder has been renamed from BlankRoadBuilder to RoadBuilder. [FIXED] Traffic signs being placed for lanes in the opposite direction has been fixed. [FIXED] LHT interactions between the Thumbnail Maker and the game have been fixed. [FIXED] Loading roads while having different LHT settings in Thumbnail Maker now works correctly. [FIXED] AN markings’ dash length being double its intended value has been fixed. [FIXED] Horizontal parking’s lane width has been fixed. [FIXED] Width calculations of fillers has been fixed. [FIXED] Fixed the scrollbar issue in the settings. [FIXED] Custom UI font in thumbnail maker now works correctly. [FIXED] Improved the search to also match words from different places in the road description.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_0_1
data.value: [NEW] Added an option to remove the curb texture from flat roads. [UPDATED] Reduced the minimum size needed for traffic lights to appear on the curb. [UPDATED] Reduced the maximum size of the arrows in the small thumbnail. [FIXED] Fixed pavement width calculation with vanilla width snapping. [FIXED] Fixed distorted icons on the thumbnail when lanes were really thin.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_0_2
data.value: [UPDATED] Traffic lights' drivable area calculations no longer stop on Empty lanes. [UPDATED] Adding streetlights in Thumbnail Maker now disables the auto-generated ones. [FIXED] Fixed vanilla snapping width calculation being off in-game. [FIXED] Fixed an error while generating IMT markings.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_0_3
data.value: [NEW] A new 'Fire Hydrant' add-on option has been added. [UPDATED] Pedestrian traffic lights now show up correctly even when there are lanes of opposite directions next to them. [UPDATED] The state of the 'Hide generated roads' checkbox is now preserved when reopening the panel. [UPDATED] Elevation fillers are no longer created when the custom elevation is the same as the default value. [UPDATED] The narrow bicycle lane decal is now used when the lane is less than 2m wide. [FIXED] The solid IMT fillers now correctly follow the lane guide. [FIXED] The IMT fillers now match the padding settings in Thumbnail Maker. [FIXED] Fixed IMT fillers' height calculations sometimes being off. [FIXED] The positions of tram poles on curb lanes have been fixed. [FIXED] An error that occurred when generating flat tram roads has been fixed. [FIXED] Fixed speed limits when using the USA (mph) region type.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_0_4
data.value: [NEW] Added AN toggles for curbless and nodeless variants. [NEW] Editing a road in Thumbnail Maker no longer generates a duplicate road file when saving. [NEW] Added an option to remove ghost lanes when IMT markings are not enabled. [UPDATED] Improved connections between flat and highway roads and pedestrian roads or other surface-level roads. [UPDATED] Increased default parking widths from 2/4/5.5m to 2/5/6m. [UPDATED] Lightened the color of the pavement median in the Thumbnail Maker. [UPDATED] Made streetlights in the Thumbnail Maker more accurately match their appearance in-game. [FIXED] Fixed incorrect transitions for 24m+ roads when paired with highways. [FIXED] Fixed a bug that caused the direction of add-ons to be flipped when they were close to the center of the road. [FIXED] Fixed lanes with a speed limit of 0. [FIXED] Fixed "Filled" IMT fillers in the IMT not following the correct guide layout. [FIXED] Fixed a visual bug with medians on curb lanes in the Thumbnail Maker.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_1_0
data.value: [NEW] AN markings have been replaced with Vanilla markings. [NEW] Markings and Fillers will now correctly twist at intersections. [NEW] Fillers now remain at the correct height while using Curb Height Adjuster. [NEW] Markings no longer have gaps at intersections. [NEW] Markings and Fillers now show up at much larger distances. [NEW] You can now generate roads with asymmetrical pavement widths. [NEW] Roads with asymmetrical pavements will have Bend nodes disabled as they are not currently supported. [NEW] Use the “Re-export Roads” button in Thumbnail Maker to regenerate all your roads’ thumbnails to reflect the road width changes. [NEW] Elevation steps for elevated lanes will now include slopes at intersections; the steepness of the slope can be adjusted in the mod options. [NEW] Trolley wires will now be rendered on nodes, but note that this requires all roads at the node to be generated after this update. [NEW] Yield, highway entrance, and highway exit signs have been added. [NEW] Added the option to hide road clutter by default, its respective AN toggle would then be used to show them instead of hiding them. [NEW] Added the option to change the repeat distance of trees and streetlights. [NEW] Added the option to randomize the distance between trees, this does not work with the Vanilla Tree Placement option. [UPDATED] The road building process in the editor has been updated to automatically clear all previous roads and provide template segments for easy testing. [UPDATED] Barriers will now always be generated, regardless of the Auto-Markings option. [UPDATED] The selected road while going into the editor no longer affects the generated road. [UPDATED] Elevated and Bridge elevations will now be automatically added while slope and tunnel elevations will be automatically removed. [UPDATED] Pavement and Gravel fillers will no longer have a curb when at surface level. [UPDATED] The size of bridge pillars has been corrected to take into account larger pavement widths. [FIXED] Automatic street lights will no longer be generated if a manual double-streetlight is placed. [FIXED] Fixed IMT markings being placed on all roads instead of just the one being edited. [FIXED] Fixed traffic signs not being generated. [FIXED] Fixed Traffic Lights facing the wrong direction while playing in LHT mode. [FIXED] Fixed default parking sizes in Thumbnail Maker.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_1_1
data.value: [NEW] Added a limit of 250 lanes while generating a road, roads with more lanes than this limit break your game. [FIXED] Fixed a bug while updating an older road that changed its original name. *Regenerating the road with this update will fix the broken road. [FIXED] Fixed Trolley bus wires on nodes sometimes crossing the left/right wires.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_1_2
data.value: [UPDATED] Improved the save panel integration. [FIXED] Fixed the transition between ground and elevated glitch. [FIXED] Fixed lanes having the wrong position when the sidewalks are smaller than 1.5m. [FIXED] Fixed curb lanes not having street lights when they're too small. [FIXED] Lowered the minimum width required for props to show on curb lanes. [FIXED] Fixed the yield sign having the wrong rotation.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_2_0
data.value: [NEW] Adding flower pots to lanes with grass on them now adds planted flowers instead. [NEW] Added slope transition for all fillers excluding Curb, Tram, & Filler Lane types. [NEW] Added an option to only generate trees on the ground elevation. [NEW] Added vanilla crosswalks with customisable styles, those only show when Vanilla Markings are enabled, and can be toggled off. [NEW] Added a Lamp Post add-on. [NEW] Added tags to roads to easily categorise your roads. [UPDATED] Added Australian speed sign option. [UPDATED] Added benches, flower pots & lamp posts as available decorations for pedestrian lanes. [UPDATED] Buffer size is now saved throughout sessions. [UPDATED] Custom text is now added automatically to the road’s description for easier search in-game. [UPDATED] You can now customise a road’s description manually. [UPDATED] Added the option to add the road’s width inside its generated name. [UPDATED] Added the option to display the lane widths on the large thumbnail. [UPDATED] Duplicating a lane while holding down the mouse button now allows you to quickly move that lane up and down. [UPDATED] Improved the “Currently editing” UI & added a button to reset your changes to the road. [UPDATED] Added a better warnings UI while editing a road instead of receiving the warnings while exporting the road. [UPDATED] Moved the saved roads section to its own sidebar that can be shown & hidden away. [UPDATED] Added more filter options in the saved road sidebar; filter by road type, road size & tags. [UPDATED] Changed the UI of saved roads to fit more on your screen, right click a road for more options like easily copying the road’s thumbnail without loading it. You can customise how many columns are shown in the sidebar inside the options. [UPDATED] Added the option to change the sorting of the saved roads. [UPDATED] Custom text on the thumbnail now changes size to fit all of the text at the top of the thumbnail. [UPDATED] Duplicate Flip now also flips the left sidewalk to the right sidewalk if the right sidewalk is empty. [UPDATED] Right-clicking the “Add Lane” button now places the lane at the top of the list, while clicking with the middle mouse button places it at the end. [UPDATED] Clicking on the speed limit textbox’s icon now opens the speed limit selection window. [UPDATED] Saving a thumbnail now opens a save dialog where you can choose the location as well as which thumbnail to save. [UPDATED] Added a “Disable Animations” option in the Themes & UI panel. [UPDATED] Improved non-asphalt roads’ transition with asphalt roads. [UPDATED] Reduced the size of the main editor panel. [UPDATED] Redesigned the in-game UI. [UPDATED] Roads in-game are now color-coded by:. [UPDATED] Red: Road was previously built but is no longer available (locally). [UPDATED] Orange: Road was built and is available, but is not updated to the current version of Road Builder. [UPDATED] Green: Road is built with the latest version of Road Builder. [FIXED] Fixed the glitch between ground & elevated levels. [FIXED] Barriers now show on the node of this transition. [FIXED] Fixed large font sizes on the thumbnail for computers that have display zoom enabled.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_2_1
data.value: [NEW] Added a reset button for the general options in-game. [UPDATED] Improved the in-game options UI. [FIXED] Fixed grass medians not showing when there's a transit stop on the lane. [FIXED] Fixed barriers showing at two-segment ground nodes.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_2_2
data.value: [NEW] Added a TM option to display the road width in units when possible. [NEW] Added a TM option to display per-lane custom speed limits on the large thumbnail. [UPDATED] Road configs sorting is now shared between in-game and Thumbnail Maker, your previous selection will be reset after this update. [UPDATED] Right-clicking a tag now inverts it, showing only roads that don’t match that tag. You can also use the middle-mouse button to clear it. [UPDATED] Grass fillers that are on the sidewalk and have transit stops on them no longer generate a pavement mesh when the stop is active, it will still hide the grass. [UPDATED] Medians on a curb lane now always end at the curb no matter the padding option. [FIXED] Fixed medians on a curb flickering when the buffer size was 0. [FIXED] Fixed medians being bugged out if they were placed on an edge curb lane. [FIXED] Fixed road-size filtering being wrong in-game. [FIXED] Fixed the right-click menu in Thumbnail Maker going under the taskbar. [FIXED] Fixed IMT markings sometimes not showing when using small lanes. [FIXED] Fixed the close button not showing in-game. [FIXED] Fixed the previously built road not being selected when re-opening the panel.
